titleStmt.title: The nightingale whose curious notes are here explain'd, in a dainty ditty sweetly fain'd. To a new and much affected court tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for E. Coules, dwelling in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
